forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: "Show at ...m distance"

comments.text: Hi all! v160.3 (you're on [version]) has a new "Show at..." button on the backside of the placement context dialog.
Click it to set a special meter value at which this placement should force-show, or force-hide!
Note force-shown lights will also always shine, so you can set a distance at which a light is always properly enabled.
the area Highlights dialog now also includes an option to highlight special "show at" distances.
Update 160.4: The "Show at" distance will now also remain when you clone-edit the placement!
Update: Your "Show at" values will now also be considered when copy & pasting a whole area! (This is a server-side update, so no new client needs to be downloaded.)

thread.latestCommentText: Update: Your "Show at" values will now also be considered when copy & pasting a whole area! (This is a server-side update, so no new client needs to be downloaded.)
